text: if you are vegan and have cravings for a
savory snack i would recommend trying
out this mushroom jerky with lime leaves
it's the vegan version of koga latyan or
shredded chicken turkey with lime leaves
you will need 500 grams of oyster
mushrooms some soy sauce vegetable oil
turmeric powder 5 spice powder chili
flakes vegan oyster sauce some mushroom
stock powder sugar garlic and fresh lime
leaves soak the oyster mushrooms in
salted water for about 5 minutes then
rinse well and squeeze out the excess
water shred the mushrooms along the
grains into strips then spread down on
the baking tray and dehydrate using a
dehydrator or an oven at 120 degrees
celsius for about 15 to 20 minutes then
gather the mushrooms in a bowl
add a teaspoon of minced garlic half a
teaspoon of 5 pie powder a teaspoon of
vegan oyster sauce 2 teaspoon sugar half
a teaspoon of mushroom stock powder a
teaspoon of soy sauce and a teaspoon of
turmeric powder and a teaspoon of chili
flakes toss well and leave to marinate
for about an hour then add a teaspoon of
vegetable oil toss well and transfer to
a non-stick pan keep stirring over
medium low heat for about 15 to 20
minutes until fluffy and dried add the
shredded lime leaves during the last
five minutes and keep stirring until
done there you have a beautiful and
tasty snack to chill with your friends
on a movie night i hope you like it if
you enjoy the video subscribe to my
channel for more i will see you then
next time bye
[Music]
